com.percussion.extension
Interface IPSExtensionHandler

All Superinterfaces:
IPSExtension
public interface IPSExtensionHandler
extends IPSExtension

An extension handler is directly responsible for loading, storing, and managing extensions of a particular type.

The implementation of an extension handler may actually be responsible for executing the extensions, or it may instead create IPSExtension objects which can execute on their own.

Implementations are not required to be thread-safe with respect to installing, cataloging, removing, or otherwise managing individual extensions. However, implementations must be aware that multiple IPSExtension objects returned from prepare() may be executed in different threads. That is, although multiple threads will not call prepare() simultaneously, prepare() may be called several times for a single extension, and the returned IPSExtension object(s) may be used simultaneously from multiple threads.

Method Detail

shutdown

void shutdown()
              throws PSExtensionException
Shuts down this extension handler. The extension manager will call this method to indicate that this extension handler will no longer be used (e.g., server shut down, etc.)

Throws:
PSExtensionException - If an error occurred which prohibited this extension handler from cleanly shutting down.

getName

String getName()
Gets the name of this extension handler.

Returns:
The name of this extension handler. Never null.

getExtensionNames

Iterator getExtensionNames()
Gets the names of all extensions installed with this extension handler.

Returns:
A non-null Iterator over 0 or more non-null PSExtensionRefs.

getExtensionNames

Iterator getExtensionNames(String context)
Gets the names of all extensions installed within the given context in this extension handler.

Parameters:
context - the context in which to search. Must not be null.
Returns:
An Iterator over 0 or more non-null PSExtensionRefs. Will return null if the given context does not exist in this handler.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - If any param is invalid.

exists

boolean exists(PSExtensionRef ref)
Returns true if and only if the given extension ref refers to an installed extension.

Parameters:
ref - The fully qualified extension name. Must not be null.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - If any param is invalid.

getExtensionDef

IPSExtensionDef getExtensionDef(PSExtensionRef ref)
                                throws com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSNotFoundException
Returns the extension definition for the extension with the given name.

Parameters:
ref - The name of an installed extension. Must not be null.
Throws:
com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSNotFoundException - If the extension does not exist.
IllegalArgumentException - If any param is invalid.

prepare

IPSExtension prepare(PSExtensionRef ref)
                     throws com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSNotFoundException,
                            PSExtensionException
Prepares and returns the installed extension.

Parameters:
ref - The name of an installed extension. Must not be null.
Throws:
com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSNotFoundException - If the extension does not exist.
PSExtensionException - If the extension is invalid.
IllegalArgumentException - If any param is invalid.

install

void install(IPSExtensionDef def,
             Iterator resources)
             throws PSExtensionException
Installs the given extension.

Parameters:
def - The extension definition. Must not be null.
resources - An Iterator over 0 or more non-null named IPSMimeContent objects specifying any resources that should be saved along with the extension. The resources may or may not correspond to the URLs returned from the def's getResourceLocations() method.
Throws:
PSExtensionException - If the extension is invalid.
IllegalArgumentException - If any param is invalid.

update

void update(IPSExtensionDef def,
            Iterator resources)
            throws PSExtensionException,
                   com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSNotFoundException
Atomically removes and re-installs the given extension. Currently this method is not guaranteed to be transactional, that is, the remove may succeed but the install may fail.

Parameters:
def - The extension definition. Must not be null.
resources - An Iterator over 0 or more non-null named IPSMimeContent objects specifying any resources that should be saved along with the extension. The resources may or may not correspond to the URLs returned from the def's getResourceLocations() method. Must not be null.
Throws:
com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSNotFoundException - If the appropriate extension does not exist. The defined extension will not be installed.
PSExtensionException - If the extension definition fails the handler's validation rules or if the extension could not be loaded (some implementations may defer loading until prepareExtension is called).
See Also:
remove(com.percussion.extension.PSExtensionRef), install(com.percussion.extension.IPSExtensionDef, java.util.Iterator)

remove

void remove(PSExtensionRef ref)
            throws com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSNotFoundException,
                   PSExtensionException
Permanently disables and removes the installed extension. Any Java classes that were defined and loaded as part of this extension must be unloaded. Any native libraries that were loaded as part of this extension must be unloaded.

Parameters:
ref - The name of an installed extension. Must not be null.
Throws:
com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSNotFoundException - If the extension does not exist.
PSExtensionException - If an error occurred while removing the extension.
IllegalArgumentException - If any param is invalid.

getResources

Iterator getResources(IPSExtensionDef def)
                      throws PSExtensionException
Returns a list of files that the extension requires by cataloging the files in the resource directory.

Parameters:
def - The extension def. May not be null.
Returns:
An Iterator over 0 or more URL objects. Path is relative to the code root of the extension. Never null.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if def is null.
PSExtensionException - if the files cannot be located.

getCodeBase

File getCodeBase(IPSExtensionDef def)
                 throws PSExtensionException
Returns the directory in which the given extension and all of its resources would be stored.

Note that this method does not consider whether such an extension actually exists or not. It just returns where the code would be stored if the extension were installed.

Parameters:
def - The extension definition. Must not be null.
Returns:
The directory in which the given extension and all of its resources would be stored. Never null.
Throws:
PSExtensionException - If the directory could not be computed or if the extension name was not well-formed.
